content.rendered:
The Verst Carbon Team

The team driving Verst Carbon’s mission to leverage carbon financing to deliver social-economic outcomes for African Communities

LEADERSHIP
Brian Nyangena CEO
Brian is in charge of providing the strategic alignment for Verst Carbon and is the vision bearer for the company. He holds Bsc. in Actuarial Science, an Msc. In mathematical finance, an MSc. In Financial Engineering, and is currently pursuing a PhD. in Blockchain.
WANGUI KAGUMBA Lead - Community Engagement and Financing
Kagumba, with a BSc. in Financial Economics and an MSc. in Computational Economics, Financial Markets and Policy, spearheads community engagement, secures project funding, and identifies financing opportunities for Verst Carbon.
EVANS KAYO Lead - Supply Side Activation
Evans, responsible for engaging carbon offset project developers, cultivates relationships and executes strategies to ensure a steady project pipeline for Verst Carbon. He holds a BSc. in Actuarial Science and pursues an MSc. in Sustainable Energy Transitions.
IAN MUTAI CTO
Ian Mutai is Verst Carbon's technology lead, providing strategic guidance to the tech team. Armed with a BSc. in Software Engineering and an MSc. in Information Systems and Technology, he drives innovation and technological advancement.
ANTHONY SURE Lead – dMRV
Antony Sure, spearheading digital Monitoring, Reporting, and Verification (dMRV) research, focuses on its effective execution across various project types. With a Bachelor of Commerce in Finance and Yale University and CFI certifications, he brings comprehensive expertise
CHARLES WAWERU Lead - Carbon Methodologies
Charles Waweru, Verst Carbon's Lead for Carbon Methodologies, harnesses his environmental science expertise, regulatory affairs knowledge, and global perspectives to spearhead sustainable carbon projects, shaping a greener future for all.
ENGINEERING TEAM
CURTIS WILSON DevOps Engineer
MARIA GITAU Full Stack Developer
MOHAMMED GUDLE Full Stack Developer
MICHAEL MWANGI Full Stack Developer
JAFFER HASSAN Full Stack Developer

Want to fill this spot?
